title: Mars Mission Planning
intro: Your team has been selected to plan humanity's next mission to Mars. You'll need to calculate trajectories, design life support systems, and plan for the challenges of deep space exploration.

difficulty.emerging: Focus on basic concepts and guided calculations
difficulty.onLevel: Standard mission parameters with moderate complexity
difficulty.advanced: Complex multi-variable problems and system design

learningStyle.visual: Diagrams, charts, and visual mission planning tools
learningStyle.readingWriting: Mission reports and detailed technical documentation
